# Vagrant Hadoop

A simple vagrant image for class or demo projects. 

## How to use

1. Install VirtualBox and Vagrant
2. Download or clone this repo
3. Do `vagrant up`

## Included

1. Installs Java 11
2. Installs Hadoop 3.2.0
3. On machine boot, runs hadoop automatically
